org.zoolu.util

Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zoolu.util.Clock
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VirtualClock

    public class Clock
extends java.lang.Object
    A clock that maintains a time variable. It provides methods for getting the current time and for creating timers.

    This class has also a default clock that can be handled through the corresponding two static methods setDefaultClock(Clock) and getDefaultClock().

      • nanoTime

        public long nanoTime()
        Gets time in nanoseconds starting from an unspecified origin. It can be used for measuring some elapsed time as difference between two instants.
        Returns:
        the time in nanoseconds
